${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1.
${ModID}:Rummage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of !M! random cards in hand by 1.

${ModID}:Cardistry.NAME: Cardistry
${ModID}:Cardistry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play this turn is returned to the top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:Cardistry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play this turn is returned to the top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:GreedyPitch.NAME: Greedy Pitch
${ModID}:GreedyPitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Greedy: Deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:PreppingUp.NAME: Prepping Up
${ModID}:PreppingUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${ModID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${ModID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL If your hand is full, gain 1 Intangible.
${ModID}:FullHouse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL If your hand is full, gain 1 Intangible.

${ModID}:PocketLint.NAME: Pocket Lint
${ModID}:PocketLint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${ModID}:RoadRage.NAME: Road Rage
${ModID}:RoadRage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL After you play 1 card, discard your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: After you play a card, discard your hand.

${ModID}:HeavySlam.NAME: Heavy SLam
${ModID}:HeavySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Greedy: Enemy loses !M! Strength.

${ModID}:GreedIsGood.NAME: Greed is Good
${ModID}:GreedIsGood.DESCRIPTION: While you're ${ModID}:Greedy, cards deal !M! additional damage and grant !M! additional Block.

${ModID}:HitTheBooks.NAME: Hit the Books
${ModID}:HitTheBooks.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Greedy: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Otherwise, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:BurningPocket.NAME: Burning Pocket
${ModID}:BurningPocket.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If this is Exhausted, add a *Miracle into your hand.

${ModID}:FromMyHat.NAME: From My Hat
${ModID}:FromMyHat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random Attack into your hand. NL It gains Retain.

${ModID}:AwakenDeath.NAME: Awaken
${ModID}:AwakenDeath.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, heal !M! HP instead and remove this buff. NL At the end of combat (if untriggered), heals for half as much.

${ModID}:Chronoboost.NAME: Chrono-Boost
${ModID}:Chronoboost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain 1 Strength for every 12th card you play.

${ModID}:Execute.NAME: Execute
${ModID}:Execute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If you are in a Stance, deal !D! damage a third time.

${ModID}:HyperBeam.NAME: HYPER BEAM
${ModID}:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [E] [E].
${ModID}:HyperBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [E].

${ModID}:InvincibleStrength.NAME: Invincible
${ModID}:InvincibleStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Invincible. NL If you already had Invincible, it lasts another turn instead.

${ModID}:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare Crush
${ModID}:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL On your next turn, gain [E] and add *SLIME *CRUSH! to your hand.

${ModID}:ShapersBlessing.NAME: Shaper's Blessing
${ModID}:ShapersBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Enter Ancient Stance.
${ModID}:ShapersBlessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block and !M! Plated Armor. NL Enter Ancient Stance.

${ModID}:SlimeCrush.NAME: SLIME CRUSH!
${ModID}:SlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
${ModID}:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and remove the target's Block. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:YouAreMine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak, and remove the target's Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Anemia.NAME: Anemia
${ModID}:Anemia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to any Poisoned enemies.

${ModID}:ArsenalGear.NAME: Arsenal Gear
${ModID}:ArsenalGear.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the next !M! turns, add a random *Uncommon or *Rare cards to your hand. They cost 0.

${ModID}:ConjureBarrage.NAME: Conjure Barrage
${ModID}:ConjureBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with *Magic *Missiles. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ConjureBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with *Magic *Missiles+. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DarkRitual.NAME: Dark Ritual
${ModID}:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain 100 Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Knighthood.NAME: Knighthood
${ModID}:Knighthood.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand to Upgrade permanently. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
${ModID}:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this didn't end combat, take !D! damage.

${ModID}:LethalShot.NAME: Lethal Shot
${ModID}:LethalShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison and !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
${ModID}:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage dealt by *Magic *Missiles by !M! this turn.

${ModID}:Minniegun.NAME: Minniegun
${ModID}:Minniegun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:PackRat.NAME: Pack Rat
${ModID}:PackRat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no Potions, gain one and remove this from your deck permanently.
${ModID}:PackRat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no Potions, gain one and Downgrade this permanently. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ScorchedEarth.NAME: Scorched Earth
${ModID}:ScorchedEarth.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-Attacks in your discard pile. Deal !D! damage for each. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SmithingHammer.NAME: Smithing Hammer
${ModID}:SmithingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:SmithingHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Upgrade !M! cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Flick.NAME: Flick
${ModID}:Flick.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Deal !D! damage a number of times equal to that card's energy cost.

${ModID}:Synergize.NAME: Synergize
${ModID}:Synergize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played was from a different Pack, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Sideboard.NAME: Sideboard
${ModID}:Sideboard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:BackpackSmack.NAME: Backpack Smack
${ModID}:BackpackSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your draw pile contains 10 or more cards, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:Showoff.NAME: Showoff
${ModID}:Showoff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

${ModID}:DestinyDraw.NAME: Destiny Draw
${ModID}:DestinyDraw.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Packs. NL Gain a random card from the chosen Pack. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MayhemForm.NAME: Mayhem Form
${ModID}:MayhemForm.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 fewer card per turn. NL At the start of your turn, choose a card from the top 3 in your draw pile and play it.
${ModID}:MayhemForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose a card from the top 3 in your draw pile and play it.

${ModID}:PackRip.NAME: Pack Rip
${ModID}:PackRip.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Packs. NL Play 3 random cards from the chosen Pack. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PackRip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Packs.  NL Play 3 random cards from the chosen Pack.

${ModID}:AcidicSpray.NAME: Acidic Spray
${ModID}:AcidicSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the target. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
${ModID}:PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Increase HP loss from Poison by 100%. NL Gain a *Poison *Potion.
${ModID}:PoisonMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase HP loss from Poison by 100%. NL Gain !M! *Poison *Potions.

${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.NAME: Captain's Cabin
${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Cannonball into your hand.
${ModID}:CaptainsCabin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Cannonballs into your hand.

${ModID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.NAME: Terror of the Seas
${ModID}:TerrorOfTheSeas.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MassProduction.NAME: Mass Production
${ModID}:MassProduction.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. Exhaust your hand and replace it with copies of that card. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to Mass Produce.

${ModID}:ScrapCannon.NAME: Scrap Cannon
${ModID}:ScrapCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.

${ModID}:HuntressEssence.NAME: Huntress Essence
${ModID}:HuntressEssence.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and draw 1 card for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:OverTime.NAME: Over Time
${ModID}:OverTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each card that you've *Exhausted this combat, increase damage by !M!.

${ModID}:SlimeSpray.NAME: Slime Spray
${ModID}:SlimeSpray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage and apply Slow to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
${ModID}:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Modify a random damaging card in hand: 'Add !M! Damage'

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Modify a random Block card in hand: 'Add !M! Block'

${ModID}:Winterize.NAME: Winterize
${ModID}:Winterize.DESCRIPTION: Channel 3 Frost. NL ${ModID}:Modify !M! random enemy-targeted cards in your draw pile: 'Apply !M! Frostbite.'

${ModID}:Throw Wrench.NAME: Throw Wrench
${ModID}:Throw Wrench.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have a Modified card in hand, deals damage twice.

${ModID}:Lighten.NAME: Lighten
${ModID}:Lighten.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Modify a card in hand: 'Retain.' and 'Float this'.

${ModID}:Improve.NAME: Improve
${ModID}:Improve.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Modify a random card in hand: 'Draw a card.' NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Enhance.NAME: Enhance
${ModID}:Enhance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Modify a card in hand: 'Gain !M! Block.'

${ModID}:Cheapen.NAME: Cheapen
${ModID}:Cheapen.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Modify a random card in your draw pile: 'Costs 0.' NL Exhaust, unless Amplify 2.

${ModID}:Expand.NAME: Expand
${ModID}:Expand.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Modify a card in your discard pile: 'Ethereal.' and 'Remove Exhaust.' NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piratify.NAME: Piratify
${ModID}:Piratify.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, Modify a random card in hand: 'Gain a Cannonball.'
${ModID}:Piratify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, Modify a random card in hand: 'Gain a Cannonball+.'

${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.NAME: Strike of Luck
${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 1 to 3 times.

${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.NAME: Penalty Strike
${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Backstrike.NAME: Backstrike
${ModID}:Backstrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Modify all Attacks in hand: 'Name gains Strike.'

${ModID}:WorkersStrike.NAME: Worker's Strike
${ModID}:WorkersStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw an Attack. If it is a Strike, gain [E].

${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.NAME: Strike Dummy Jr.
${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Strikes deal 2 more damage this combat.

${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.NAME: Different Strikes
${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in hand. Replace them with random Strikes that cost 1 less. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.NAME: Strike of Genius
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played and gains Exhaust.
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random Upgraded "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played and gains Exhaust.

${ModID}:StrikeABargain.NAME: Strike a Bargain
${ModID}:StrikeABargain.DESCRIPTION: Your attacks costs 0 this turn. You cannot play non-Attacks this turn.
